Package imr.media.audio

The audio package provides an audio player supporting the following extensions: mp3 wav The SoundPlayer in the media package is multipurpose and also supports playing MIDI files, but if you only need an audio player to play single files you can choose this option.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioPlayer
    The AudioPlayer class provides funcionality to play digital audio for the following formats: mp3 wav aif au Also provides a method to know if the audio data loaded was completely played.

Package imr.media.audio Description

The audio package provides an audio player supporting the following extensions:
  • mp3
  • wav
The SoundPlayer in the media package is multipurpose and also supports playing MIDI files, but if you only need an audio player to play single files you can choose this option.
